page.title: 04The Sheep Farmer 3
page.content: {Question}What time do you get up in the morning? {Answer}Sometimes it's half past six but if I'm gathering it's four o'clock because if you go in the afternoon you would get very hot and tired and so would the dogs and the sheep.I sometimes have two breakfasts,one before I go out and one when I come in. {Question}How do you feel about climbing hills {Answer}I usually like to get a lift up now Ha Ha Ha.It's a steep climb from sea level to over 3000 feet. Sometimes you can't manage a vehicle in some places and you have to walk to each hirsel.There's too many trees now and fewer sheep.There's fewer deer as well because of the plantations.There's big money for investment in trees and they get the preference.
